metadata.name: Is this role being posted for the immigration team?

title: Veterinarian
content:
Our Opportunity:  
Chewy’s mission is to be the most trusted and convenient destination for pet parents and partners everywhere. We view pets (and pet parents) as family and are obsessed with meeting their needs and exceeding customer expectations through every interaction. The Chewy Health team is focused on advancing how veterinarians and pet parents care for pets and are on a multi-year journey to enhance the experience of working with veterinarians to keep pets happy and healthy.   
 As part of this mission, the Chewy Health team is hiring a Veterinarian to help us build a suite of services that enable pet customers to engage with their veterinarian through every step of their pet parent journey.  This position is a unique opportunity to work with one of the most dynamic and innovative teams at Chewy! 
What You'll Do:  
As a Veterinarian, you will be an advocate for high-quality pet healthcare while embodying the Chewy culture to work collaboratively with your peers and deliver a best-in-class customer experience.  Doctor of Veterinary Medicine is responsible for the following: 

Collaborate with Chewy Health team members on the development of current and new services and products.  
Provide subject matter expertise on companion animal health and wellness for Chewy Health, while championing proactive and consistent pet healthcare 
Participate in program development and enhancing training procedures.  
Identify and triage platform improvements and support innovative advancements.  
Leverage accredited skills to develop programming, policies and services that deliver an unparalleled client experience 

 
What You'll Need:  

A DVM/VMD degree with an active license (dependent on location).   
Proficient computer skills, as this role will require interacting with customers and Chewy team members through various digital channels.  
Proven experience in embracing forward thinking and curiosity.  


Exemplary listening and problem-solving skills.  
Ability to multitask comfortably.  
Experience and comfort in collaborating with colleagues in a team-oriented environment.  
Passion for helping people and pets with empathy and excellent customer service focus.  

 
Chewy is committed to equal opportunity. We value and embrace diversity and inclusion of all Team Members.
If you have a disability under the Americans with Disabilities Act or similar law, or you require a religious accommodation, and you wish to discuss potential accommodations related to applying for employment at our company, please contact HR@Chewy.com.
To access Chewy’s Privacy Policy, which contains information regarding information collected from job applicants and how we use it, please click here: Chewy Privacy Policy.
  Chewy is committed to equal opportunity. We value and embrace diversity and inclusion of all Team Members. If you have a disability under the Americans with Disabilities Act or similar law, and you need an accommodation during the application process or to perform these job requirements, or if you need a religious accommodation, please contact CAAR@chewy.com.
 
If you have a question regarding your application, please contact HR@chewy.com.
 
To access Chewy's Customer Privacy Policy, please click here. To access Chewy's California CPRA Job Applicant Privacy Policy, please click here.

By clicking “Acknowledge/Confirm” on this form, you agree to receive emails, text messages and calls about your potential employment with Chewy, including this job application, interviewing, and onboarding, as well as your relationship with us, by or on behalf of Chewy, including via automated technology and artificial or pre-recorded voice, at the telephone number provided above. Msg & data rates may apply. Subject to our Terms of Use (https://careers.chewy.com/terms)  and Privacy Policy (https://www.chewy.com/app/content/privacy). Opt-out from these messages at any time by replying STOP to any message from us. Texting STOP to one shortcode will not effectuate a stop request for all shortcodes to which you are subscribed.
